Hi!

Since the last update, when I use the "f" key to hold SAS without activating it permanently(as in, it deactivate as soon as I release the key) it does nothing(the SAS doesn't activate).

However, when the SAS is on, when I press the "f" key, the SAS just deactivate.
Hi goldenpeach, make sure you have a pilot Kerbal on board or a probe that has SAS
I have one pilote in the pod, when SAS is permanently activated, it work fine but as soon as I press "f", it deactivate.
